Technologies and Programming Languages to Use
=============================================

Technologies
------------

- Django: A high-level Python web framework for rapid development.
- Pytest: A framework to write and run Python tests easily.
- Lint: A tool to check code for stylistic and programming errors.
- Sentry: An error-tracking service for monitoring applications.
- SQLite 3: A lightweight, file-based relational database.
- Render: A cloud platform to deploy web applications and services.
- GitHub: A platform to host and manage code repositories.

Languages
---------

- Python: The main programming language used for backend logic.
- SQL: Language to interact with relational databases.
- CSS: Styling language for web page presentation.
- HTML: Markup language to structure web pages.
- JavaScript: Language for interactive front-end functionality.
- Bash: Command-line scripting language for automation tasks.
